about_the_game:
This Toy Pack includes 18 toy Clothing Items, 2 toy Wigs, 13 toy Furniture Items, 1 toy Mount, and 1 toy Pet.


If you’re looking for a set full of childlike wonder, then this is the pack for you! The Toy Pack is filled with 35 trinkets and treasures that will turn your house into the playroom of your dreams.

Pack includes:
  • Toy Furniture Set: Toy Bear Chair, Toy Block Chair, Toy Cube Table, Toy Block Table, Toy Bear Couch, Toy Block Wardrobe, Toy Bed, Puzzle Piece Rug, Paddle Ball Rug, Toy Bear Plushie, Toy Duck Plushie, Flashlight Lamp, and Toy Watch Clock
  • Toy Bear Outfit Set: Toy Bear Hat, Toy Bear Shirt, Toy Bear Gloves, and Toy Bear Pants
  • Toy Mouse Outfit: Costume Mouse Ear Headband and Costume Mouse Robe
  • Toy Robot Outfit: Toy Robot Helmet, Toy Robot Shirt, Toy Robot Gloves, and Toy Robot Boots
  • Toy Soldier Outfit: Toy Soldier Helmet, Toy Soldier Shirt, Toy Soldier Gloves, and Toy Soldier Pants
  • Toy Potato Outfit: Toy Potato Mustache Wig and Mustache and Toy Potato Costume
  • Toy Phone Outfit: Toy Phone Hat and Toy Phone Costume
  • Doll Wig Set: Raggedy Doll Wig and Messy Doll Hair Wig
  • Rocking Horse Mount
  • Friend Bot 1000, the Toy Robot Pet

name: Sun Haven: Toy Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This Toy Pack includes 18 toy Clothing Items, 2 toy Wigs, 13 toy Furniture Items, 1 toy Mount, and 1 toy Pet.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Danish, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
